I have added multiplayer with <a href="https://github.com/Birch-san/box2d-wasm">Box2D-WASM</a> on the server side to the examples of the <a href="https://phaser.io/tutorials/making-your-first-phaser-3-game">Making your first Phaser 3 game</a> tutorial.

Playground demos on the <a href="https://glitch.com">Glitch</a> free Node.js hosting:

- Part 01: Introduction
- Part 02. Loading assets
- Part 03. World Building
- Part 04. The Platforms (explanation)
- Part 05. Ready Player One
- Part 06. Body velocity
- Part 07. Controlling the player with the keyboard
- Part 08. Stardust
- <a href="https://multiplayer-with-box2dwasm-part-09-a-score-to-settle.glitch.me" target="_blank">Part 09. A score to settle</a>
- <a href="https://multiplayer-with-box2dwasm-part-10-bouncing-bombs.glitch.me" target="_blank">Part 10. Bouncing Bombs</a>

Playground sources on Glitch:

- Part 01: Introduction
- Part 02. Loading assets
- Part 03. World Building
- Part 04. The Platforms (explanation)
- Part 05. Ready Player One
- Part 06. Body velocity
- Part 07. Controlling the player with the keyboard
- Part 08. Stardust
- <a href="https://glitch.com/edit/#!/multiplayer-with-box2dwasm-part-09-a-score-to-settle.glitch.me" target="_blank">Part 09. A score to settle</a>
- <a href="https://glitch.com/edit/#!/multiplayer-with-box2dwasm-part-10-bouncing-bombs.glitch.me" target="_blank">Part 10. Bouncing Bombs</a>

My step by step tutorial to build and run the examples with Rollup: <a href="https://8observer8.github.io/tutorials/deploy/building-and-running-the-project-in-debug-and-release-for-client-and-server/public/index.html">Building and running the project in debug and release for client and server</a>
